features: Unscented and Skin Friendly: reducing worries about allergies or skin sensitivities – All Clear Care wipes are pure and gentle.
Pure water, Tender Care: made with 99% pure water, ensuring a hypoallergenic and irritation-free experience for your little one's delicate skin.
Tough on Messes, Gentle on Skin: durable textured surface measuring 7" x 8". Hard-to-tear 55 gsm non-woven material, these wipes ensure effective cleaning without falling apart. DO NOT FLUSH.
Effortless Accessibility: larger opening (3cm x 6cm or 1.18" x 2.36") for easy and quick access.
Aloe and Vitamin E: Infused with a touch of aloe and vitamin E, providing skin with natural nourishment, leaving it soft and smooth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gentle and Unscented Gentle wipes with just a touch of Aloe and Vitamin E to soothe and soften sensitive skin.
For Sensitive Skin 99% water, minimizing the risk of allergic reactions and ideal for sensitive skin.
Flip-top lid and extra-sized opening for hassle-free diaper changes The flip-top lid and an extra-sized opening makes it easier to access wipes for a quicker, less frustrating diaper change.

Large, textured wipes for an efficient and thorough cleaning Composed of a durable and thick 55 GSM textured wipe surface that's 33% larger than the standard wipe, allowing you to confidently tackle messes while using fewer wipes.
Bulk Value Each box contains six packages totaling 480 wipes. Greater value and more time between purchases.
Perfect for many everyday uses Freshen up areas of the body Clean hands Wipe down surfaces Practical for other applications

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin and make-up removal
reviews.reviewText: We recently tried these wipes for the first time, and my whole family was very impressed! They are gentle enough to be used on the face but also durable enough to be used pretty much anywhere. I love that there is no fragrance and a high water content, because it makes these wipes great for sensitive skin. The wipe is soft and thick, so it stretches to a much larger size than a typical wipe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: they are durable, don’t tear easily like some other wipes do when pulling one out of the pack. the multi pack is convenient versus having to replace a pack every time it runs out. not too wet, and do not leave excess moisture after using one. i think they’re a little more expensive than they should be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong, gentle baby wipes
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these water baby wipes as I always do usually and that on my hands, face and after using the restroom. I appreciate the larger size of the wipes and that it's sturdy and doesn't fall apart. It has just the right amount of wetness to get the job done. Being unscented and water based is better for the skin. It's a good product and I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gentle for skin.
reviews.reviewText: This is a huge case of baby wipes that are at a decent price point. They are primarily water and aloe based so they are very gentle on my little one's skin and no fragrance has been added which is a huge plus for meThe wipes are a smidge bigger than some of the others I have used, and they seem quite durable, they have not torn easily and hold up to big messes. The opening is a little smaller than I would prefer but manageable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars quality wipes, durable, no odor
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are great. I found them to be durable and sturdy to use on my toddler. We don't have too many blowouts type of situation anymore so I didn't get to test these wipes out under those circumstances but for normal cleaning these have been effective. Each pack has 80 pieces of wipes so it is a pretty bulky pack. The size of each wipe seems pretty standard, I didn't find it to be unusually large nor smaller than the other brands we've used in the past. The wipes doesn't have any odor or scent to it, it just smells like unscented wipes. I made sure to test it out on my skin first and didn't experience any irritation, just a refreshing sensation of water cleaning my skin. I've since used it on my toddler and it is great. I really have no complaints about these. While price wise these aren't the cheapest nor the most expensive, if you can get it with a discount coupon that'll be even better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great basic baby wipes without a bunch of extra ingredients that could cause irritation. They are unscented, gentle, and alcohol free. Great to have around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good fragrance free wipes
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are standard size. They're unscented, and pretty sturdy. I love to carry them in my car, and they get daily use. My husband also keeps a pack in his work bag. These don't leave a weird feeling on your hands like some wipes do. They feel like I rinsed my hands with water. These aren't the cheapest wipes out there, but if you can catch a coupon on them they're definitely worth trying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice wipes not easily sealed
reviews.reviewText: Though these are nice wipes, with Very Very little scent, they don't close well. Sometimes you need to run your fingers around the whole rim to hear it snap closed, others it just seems to close if you press right behind the tab. Not a bad wipe, but weird to get them closed, not something fun if you rush around and can't check the closure.
